ygData.subject: Is selos in a group a megataunt?
ygData.msgSnippet: I have gotten in two *good* yard groups in Mistmoore the last two nights, which I hear is rare, but I have been doing well. I like to keep Selos going (with
ygData.messageBody:
I have gotten in two *good* yard groups in Mistmoore the last two nights,
which I hear is rare, but I have been doing well. I like to keep Selos going
(with drum) in case one of the clockwork trains catches us and we have to
zone (in fact the warriors were routinly /following me during breaks just in
case). One thing I noticed was if something spawned or someone else pulled
something it headed right for me even if they started wacking it before it
arrived to begin pummeling me. Assuming it wasn't my breath, does anyone
else notice this?

Tszaaz
